verses.1: Tua ciangin Josefʼ tapate sung panin Manassehʼ tapa Makhir, Makhirʼ tapa Gilead, Gileadʼ tapa Hefer, Heferʼ tapa Zelofehadʼ tanute a nai ah hong pai uh hi. Ama tanuteʼ minte in: Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah le Tirzah ahi hi.
verses.2: Amaute, Mosesʼ mai le siampi Eleazarʼ mai le makaiteʼ mai le mihonte khempeuhʼ mai, kikhopna buk kongah ding uh a,
verses.3: “Ka pa uh gamlak ah a si hi. Korah tawh kipawlin Topa langpangin a kikaikhawm mihonte lakah amah kihel lo hi. Ahih hangin ama khialhna hangin si a, amah in tapa nei lo hi.
verses.4: Amah in tapa a neih loh man bekin bang hangin a beh sung panin ka pa uhʼ min mangthang ding ahi hiam? Ka pa uh sanggamteʼ lakah kote zong neihsa hong pia un,” a ci uh hi.
verses.5: Moses in Topaʼ mai ah amauʼ thu a gen hi.
verses.7: “Zelofehadʼ tanuteʼ thugen man hi. Amauʼ paʼ sanggamte lakah neihsa gamh amaute tungah na pia dinga, amauʼ paʼ gamh amauteʼ tungah na tungsak ding hi.
verses.8: Israel mite tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: ‘Pasal khat si-in, tapa a neih kei leh, ama gamh a tanu na luahsak ding uh hi.
verses.9: Amah in tanu a neih kei leh, ama gamh a sanggam pasalte tungah na tungsak ding uh hi.
verses.10: Amah in sanggam pasal a neih kei leh, ama gamh ama paʼ sanggam pasalte tungah na pia ding uh hi.
verses.11: Ama pa in sanggam pasal a neih kei leh, ama gamh ama innkuan tawh a kinai ama behpaʼ tungah na pia ding uh a, amah in tang ding hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin hih pen Israel mite tungah thukham le ngeina kip hi ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
verses.12: Topa in Moses kiangah, “Hih Abarim mual tungah pai to inla, Israel miteʼ tungah ka piak leitang en in.
verses.13: Na muh khit ciangin na sanggampa Aaron mah bangin nang zong na mite kiang na zuan ta ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh,
verses.14: mihonpite a kitot lai-un tui phualah keimah sianthosak ding hunin Zin gamlak ah keima thu nong lehpan hi,” a ci hi. (Hihte pen Zin gamlak, Kadesh gam Meribah tui a thupiangte a cihna ahi hi.)
verses.16: “Topaʼ mihonte, a cing nei lo tuute a bat loh nadingin amauteʼ mai ah pai khia-in amauteʼ mai ah a tum ding, amaute paikhiat pihin amaute a ciahpih ding, mihonte a uk dingin, Topa, mi khempeuh tungah nuntakna a pia Pasian ahi nangmah in mi khat seh in,” a ci hi.
verses.18: Topa in Moses kiangah, “Nunʼ tapa Joshua, siamna a nei mipa la inla, ama tungah na khut nga in.
verses.19: Siampi Eleazar le mihon khempeuh mai ah amah na dingsak dinga, amauteʼ muhna ah amah za na pia ding hi.
verses.20: Israel mihon khempeuh in ama thu a man theih nadingin thuneihna pawl khat amah na guan ding hi.
verses.21: Siampi Eleazarʼ mai ah amah ding dinga, amah in Topaʼ mai ah Urim thukhenna tawh thu dotsak ding hi. Amah le amah tawh a om Israel mi khempeuh, mihon buppi, ama thu tawh pusuak ding uh a, ama thu mah tawh sung tum ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.22: Topa in amah a thupiak bangin Moses gamta a, amah in Joshua la-in siampi Eleazar le mihon buppi mai ah dingsak a,
verses.23: amah in ama tungah a khutte nga-in, Topa in ama tungah a gen bangin Joshua tungah za a pia hi.
